name: Sherlock Holmes
description: Brilliant, aloof and almost entirely lacking in social graces.

name: Mary Morstan
description: John met Mary Morstan following the death of Sherlock.

name: Mycroft Holmes
description: Sherlock's older brother but there's little brotherly love there.

name: Detective Inspector Lestrade
description: The best that Scotland Yard has to offer - but he knows that Sherlock is better.

name: Mrs Hudson
description: Sherlock and John's landlady - not their housekeeper!

name: Phillip Anderson
description: Clever but not as clever as he'd like to be.
